name: V.S. Shaggy x Matt - Definitive Edition
name_original: V.S. Shaggy x Matt - Definitive Edition
description:
WARNING:
This mod is not mine, it is just a port for Psych Engine
This mod is a port of the Shaggy x Matt mod for Psych Engine and little changes, enjoy it.

WARNING 2:
IF YOU WANT FIX THE 1 KEY THING YOU HAVE TO PRESS 7 IN ANY SONG AND GO IN SONGS AND CHANGE THE MANIA!

PROLOGUE:
Last round - When everything started.

CANON SONGS:
Power link - Matt goes against Shaggy to receive his power
Revenge - Matt uses his new power to beat bf once and for all
Final destination - Matt & Shaggy sing together against bf
Final destination  - (GOD) Ready for the challenge?

BONUS SONGS:
Cosmic Cessation - orange Shaggy and black matt 1v1 bf!
Cosmic Cessation - (GOD) Ready for the second challeng?
4 Players Joined - Matt & Shaggy & Tricky & Bob sing together against bf
6 Players Joined - Matt & Shaggy & Tricky & Bob & Whitty & Zardy sing together against bf
4 Players Joined - (GOD) Omg there is so much mechanics now!
6 Players Joined - (GOD) Not done lol
